label: 北朝
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: The line of Sovereigns (Tennō) reigning in Kyōto from 1336 to 1392 under the aegis of the Ashikaga Military Dictators (Shōgun) while the legitimate Sovereigns of the Southern Court (Nanchō) were governing from Yoshino in Yamato-no-kuni. [天皇、京都、足利、将軍、南朝、吉野、大和国]
